SEARCH
Package hms.users

Class User

java.lang.Object
hms.users.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist
public class User extends Object
Base class for all user types in the system including patients, doctors, administrators, and pharmacists.
